info.name: Clean, Minimal, Dark Facebook v1.6
info.description: Hello, it's Fers4t. I've just coded a really clean, dark and minimal Facebook. It was a little bit hard. I'm working on this for 3-4 weeks. If you have any idea, please mail me.
info.additionalInfo:
# v1.6
- Some colors fixed 


#v1.0.2
-Changed "Loading" color.

#v1.0.1
- Changed "Memories on this day" colors

# v1.0

- All colors changed. New colors are more good for your mind and eyes.
- Chat bar and left column are "hidden". For see your chat bar and left column, just use your mouse.

# v1.4
- Time colors changed
- Poll colors changed
- Some text colors fixed

# v1.5 
- Video screen colors fixed.
